catalog_script_client.name: Validate Email onSubmit

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_3067ba172f713010b14c5fd62799b662
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Intern Registration">5b1e787d2f313010b14c5fd62799b699</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:63820d312f713010b14c5fd62799b6f7</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Validate Email onSubmit</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onSubmit(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
    if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
        return;
    }

    //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
    var re = /^[A-Za-z.0-9]+@accenturefederal.com$/;
	if(!re.test(newValue)){
		g_form.showFieldMsg('email', "Invalid email address. Note: must end with @accenturefederal.com" , 'info');
		return false;
	}

}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-08-11 15:03:16</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>3067ba172f713010b14c5fd62799b662</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Validate Email onSubmit</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Training Tracker" source="x_167994_training">b9a77c3c2f1130101caaff1df699b687</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Training Tracker">b9a77c3c2f1130101caaff1df699b687</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_3067ba172f713010b14c5fd62799b662</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-08-11 15:05:34</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onSubmit</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
